posts.post_title: FOR SALE: Several N172 Old Judges & other items (More Added!!!)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
I am in the process of adding many items to my "Pre-War For Sale" page of my website. I have added a group of 22 N172's including some tougher players to the page. I will be continually updating the page over the next 2 weeks (as I will have a little extra time with the holidays)--so be sure to check back often. All the N172's include front and back scans so you can see what you are getting. Email any questions to  rhettyeakley@netzero.com 


For Sale Page:
[url]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/forsale.html[/url]


Also check out the other sections of my website, as there are many non-Pre-War Baseball items for sale also.


Website Homepage:
[url]http://www.starsofthediamond.com[/url]


Shipping will generally be around $5 regardless of # of items purchased--if the item is large in size it may be a bit more, however. Again, emails should go to rhettyeakley@netzero.com


Some OJ's included in the sale:
[IMG]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/n172burnsfb.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/n172traffleyfb.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/n172hendersonfb.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/n172peeplesfb.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/n172williamsonfb.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.starsofthediamond.com/n172oneilfb.JPG[/IMG]
